DOC.brief_summary: This is part of a larger study for which participants have already completed memory and thinking tests. In this study, investigators are trying to learn how deep-brain stimulation affects memory skills in essential tremor (ET) patients. We are especially trying to figure out how stimulation on each side of the brain may affect working memory.
DOC.brief_title: Ventrointermediate Nucleus (VIM DBS) and Working Memory
DOC.criteria: ET PATIENTS: Clinical diagnosis of essential tremor affecting the upper extremities. Previous unilateral or bilateral DBS of the VIM Ages 40 70 A useable presurgical MR scan CONTROLS: Spouse or acquaintance of enrolled patient participant Ages 40 70 ET PATIENTS: Clinical evidence of other neurological conditions Significant psychiatric condition CONTROLS: Clinical evidence of other neurological conditions Significant psychiatric condition
